tasks.title: MyFatoorah Integration
tasks.description: Integrate MyFatoorah payment gateway on the checkout page so users can make purchases

tasks.title: Display MyFatoorah Seller Commission Info
tasks.description: When admin manually creates a seller in MyFatoorah, show the returned commission and supplier info (e.g., CommissionValue, DepositTerms, etc.) in the seller's dashboard under the Supplier Details section.

tasks.title: Set Up Replica Backend Environment with Sameer
tasks.description: Coordinate with Sameer to replicate the existing backend container onto a new server for the Fayiz project.
